name: g-center
function: Love, identity, and direction in life
neural_correlate: Heart consciousness, identity formation, magnetic direction
pressure_type: Existential questions about who I am and where I'm going

defined_mechanics.description: Fixed sense of identity and consistent direction
challenges: May not understand identity fluidity in others

open_mechanics.description: Fluid identity and direction, samples many possibilities
open_mechanics.conditioning: Pressure to know who you are and where you're going

somatic_scan_instructions: Feel your sternum and heart area. Notice sense of self or emptiness.
regulation_techniques: Try on different identities without attachment
Be different people in different environments

neuroception.safety_signals: Center operating in its correct frequency, no over-identification or conditioning
neuroception.threat_signals: Conditioning patterns active, attempting to be what you're not
